Description:
-------------
The world has been devastated by a series of climatic disasters and society on the brink of total chaos. Now the aliens have returned with a new invasion force ready to nothing less than to annihilate humanity, beginning to shatter one of the most iconic cities on Earth.

In New York, terrifying alien invaders lurk the streets and a plague spreads very fast and kills thousands of people in the city. The city systems have collapsed, the streets are destroyed, buildings are on fire, New York as you have never seen before.

Or paramilitary forces and American military might can stop the invaders and anyone who does not flee is a dead man. Survive in this scenario full of death and destruction will require a technology far beyond what any soldier today can imagine.

Only one man can survive. A super soldier bearing the Nanosuit 2 has the last word to survive in this jungle called New York.

Features

* New York, New York: In Crysis 2 players will find that the reference is still the PC game that started the saga. Crysis 2 exceeds in all respects to its predecessor, but focuses on New York City.
* Alien impossible and AI: No AI like Crysis2. In this story, players will be challenged by more realistic responses that exist in a video game.
* Nanosuit 2: Adapt this to suit your way of fighting in real time, unlock a complete catalog of totally real skills.
* Multiplayer: CrytekUK has reinvented multiplayer thanks to the intensity of Nanosuit 2.Used Nanosuit technology, players will have almost unlimited possibilities to fight against such adverse half.

Requirements:
-------------
* Operating system: Windows XP, Vista or Windows 7, with the latest Service Pack
Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 2Ghz or higher
Memory: 2GB (Vista requires 3GB)
* Hard Drive: 9GB of free space
* Video: nVidia 8800GT with 512MB RAM, 512MB ATI 3850HD with RAM, or suprior.
Sound: Sound card compatible with DirectX

* Control: Supports Microsoft Xbox 360 Remote Windows

* The Internet connection is required the first time the game init.
